title: Did Melania Trump hire a sorcerer to clean up Obama's White House as "devils "?
subtitle: According to the First Lady's spokesman, the widely shared reports that she demanded the expulsion of evil spirits in the White House "are by no means true."
author: David Emery
vclaim: The First Lady (Melania Trump) requested the expulsion of the White House from the "bollies and bloody images" allegedly left by the Obama family before entering it.
